segments.text: I would like to watch the Oscars on Tv tonight . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd love to . It ’ s interesting to see who is considered the best in their field and which film are thought to be particularly good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like watching it for the fashion . I like to see what the ladies are wearing . Of course , the men nearly always just wear the traditional tuxedo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes the men wear flamboyant colours . Which films do you think will win awards this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm really not sure . Usually just one or two films look set to sweep the awards ceremony , but this year there are several contenders .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re right . This year should be much more exciting than usual . What ’ s you favourite award category ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You might think this strange , but I like the category for “ best foreign language film " .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s nice to see foreign language films making a little impact on Hollywood . I like the “ best actor and actress ” .
segments.speaker: S2
